divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside on June 17 around 1145 close to midnight smoking outside when i seen a light in the sky look like a star at first so i paid no attention to it then it got bigger and brighter and was moving with precision so it knew where it was going and then I seen what I assumed to be two military jets then the light turned bright orange and dissapeared. today june 19th around same time i seen it again so i got it on camera dissapeared again with the jets closing in again.
Summary: moving light i have more videos
trends: There have been no other sightings in Caldwell
This sighting has never been favorited.
